solution_line_template: Each sheet of paper was {pages_per_side}*{sides_per_sheet}=<<{pages_per_side}*{sides_per_sheet}={pages_per_sheet}>>{pages_per_sheet} pages
So he used {total_pages_printed}/{pages_per_sheet}=<<{total_pages_printed}/{pages_per_sheet}={sheets_of_paper_used}>>{sheets_of_paper_used} sheets of paper
